history.narrative: Law 9-122 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-417, which was retained by CounciL. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 3, 1992, and April 7, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 24, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-196 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-122 became effective on June 11, 1992.
